item.description:
Paul Esajian

Paul Esajian of Flip This House will share his Rehab for Huge Profit secrets!

Paul is one of the most successful young investors in the nation and the past two years alone he has bought, rehabbed, and sold over 200 single family and multi-family investment properties in the state of CT. His average rehab budget is $35,000+. Systemizing the rehab process & creating relationships with contractors through the country through his systems has allowed for his exponential growth and success in Real Estate Investing.

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 PM, Thursday, July 21, 2011

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers
item.how_to_find_us: We are upstairs in the Eliot Room
item.why: Paul Esajian of Flip This House shares his Rehab for Huge Profit secrets! In the past two years alone he has bought, rehabbed, and sold over 200 single family and multi-family investment properties. Be at this meeting!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Paul Esajian of Flip this House joins BAREIA Thur 7/21 - Sat 7/23
